trans-unit.source: Defines endpoint or contract behaviors that can export custom metadata.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i comportamenti di endpoint o del contratto che possono esportare metadati personalizzati.

trans-unit.source: To modify and extend the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> objects, implement the IWsdlExportExtension interface on an endpoint, contract, or operation behavior (an object that implements either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>) and add the behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare ed estendere i servizi descrizione linguaggio WSDL (Web) esportato da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>oggetti, implementare l'interfaccia di IWsdlExportExtension in un comportamento dell'endpoint, contratto o operazione (un oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>) e aggiungere il comportamento per la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can also implement IWsdlExportExtension on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, è anche possibile implementare IWsdlExportExtension un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > IWsdlExportExtension implementations are never invoked if they are implemented as an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > IWsdlExportExtension implementazioni non vengono mai richiamate se sono implementati come un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>

trans-unit.source: IWsdlExportExtension does not export custom policy assertions even though [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] exports custom binding policy assertions to the appropriate element inside WSDL.
trans-unit.target: IWsdlExportExtension non Esporta asserzioni di criteri personalizzate anche se [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Esporta asserzioni di criteri di associazione personalizzate all'elemento appropriato in WSDL.

trans-unit.source: If you want to export custom policy assertions, implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera esportare asserzioni di criteri personalizzate, implementare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>interfaccia.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The metadata publication process begins by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> which in turn calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Il processo di pubblicazione di metadati inizia chiamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>che a sua volta chiama <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per ogni endpoint.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is exported by first exporting its contract.When exporting a contract the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName> calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on all IWsdlExportExtension implementations on the contract, and operation behaviors for that contract.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint viene esportato esportando prima il relativo contratto. Durante l'esportazione di un contratto di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName>chiamate il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo su tutte le implementazioni di IWsdlExportExtension al contratto e comportamenti dell'operazione per tale contratto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Operations that use wildcard actions are not exported in metadata, so IWsdlExportExtension implementations on operation behaviors for these operations are not exported.
trans-unit.target: Le operazioni che utilizzano azioni jolly non vengono esportate nei metadati, in modo non vengono esportate le implementazioni di IWsdlExportExtension su comportamenti dell'operazione per queste operazioni.

trans-unit.source: After exporting the contract, the port and binding are exported and exported policy expressions are attached.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver esportato il contratto, la porta e associazione vengono esportati e vengono allegate le espressioni dei criteri esportate.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> methods provide access to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> so that IWsdlExportExtension implementations can report recoverable errors and warnings through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sia il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>metodi forniscono l'accesso per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>in modo che le implementazioni IWsdlExportExtension possono segnalare gli errori e avvisi tramite il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The context objects passed into both methods provide convenient mappings from exported WSDL elements to properties of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti di contesto passati in entrambi i metodi forniscono mapping convenienti tra gli elementi WSDL esportati alle proprietà di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>oggetti.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: If an IWsdlExportExtension implementation throws an exception on export, the generated metadata is in an inconsistent state and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> object should be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se un'implementazione IWsdlExportExtension genera un'eccezione durante l'esportazione, i metadati generati sono in uno stato incoerente e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>oggetto deve essere eliminato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Custom export extension must run after the built-in serializer populates the service description.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > L'estensione dell'esportazione personalizzata deve eseguire dopo che il serializzatore incorporato popola la descrizione del servizio.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for a contract.
trans-unit.target: Scrive elementi di servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) personalizzati nel WSDL generato per un contratto.

trans-unit.source: The ExportContract method is called when the metadata export system is exporting the contract.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ExportContract viene chiamato quando il sistema di esportazione dei metadati sta esportando il contratto.

trans-unit.source: Only contract and operation behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the ExportContract call.
trans-unit.target: Solo i comportamenti del contratto e operazione implementazione <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>l'inoltro della chiamata ExportContract.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: All behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i comportamenti che implementano <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>ottenere il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>chiamare.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: Use the `context` parameter to modify the WSDL to be exported.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il `context` parametro per modificare il WSDL da esportare.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere la sezione esempio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref> che esporta le informazioni del contratto.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce mapping tra gli elementi WSDL esportati alla descrizione del contratto.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Scrive elementi di servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) personalizzati nel WSDL generato per un endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Implement the ExportEndpoint method to modify the WSDL exported for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Implementare il metodo ExportEndpoint per modificare il WSDL esportato per un endpoint.

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the contract has been exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dopo che il contratto è stato esportato da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref> che esporta le informazioni sull'endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce mapping tra gli elementi WSDL esportati alla descrizione dell'endpoint.
